titles.title: Protect and Serve Act of 2018
A bill to make a deliberate, targeted attack on a law enforcement officer a crime, and for other purposes.
Protect and Serve Act of 2018

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Protect and Serve Act of 2018
This bill amends the federal criminal code to add a new section that imposes criminal penalties on a person who knowingly causes (or attempts to cause) bodily injury to a person based on the actual or perceived status of the person as a law enforcement officer.
